main event: A witness observed a white light in the sky on July 15, 1959, in Dayton, Ohio, which exhibited slight movement.
interesting points: The white light was described as appearing like a bright star,The observation lasted between 1-2 minutes,Only one object was reported,The report considered the possibility of reflection of light or other atmospheric phenomena,The sighting was classified as unknown due to insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
witness description: The witness noticed the light while observing the sky.
